author: Football Italia staff
title: Pordenone patron free of COVID-19
description: Serie B side Pordenone have announced that their President Mauro Lovisa has recovered from coronavirus.  	Lovisa was confirmed to have tested positive for COVID-19 last week, but he has made a swift return to health.
content:
Serie B side Pordenone have announced that their President Mauro Lovisa has recovered from coronavirus.
Lovisa was confirmed to have tested positive for COVID-19 last week, but he has made a swift return to health.
